p: The information obtained in the interview consisted of two parts, the basic information, including the age and gender of the interviewees as well as the shop location, and the answers to six semi-structured questions, as follows: (1) how was the traditional knowledge obtained; (2) for how long has the shop been operating; (3) whether there are commodities other than tea sold; (4) the composition of qīng-căo-chá tea; (5) the effects of this qīng-căo-chá tea; and (6) other relevant information.
